name: Jumbo Juice
description:
You'd think your first day on the job with a company as relaxed as this would be a breeze. Unfortunately that's far from the truth. Make your way through the day at Jumbo Juice so you can pick up your paycheck and never have to come here again.

A collaboration between USC Games and Berklee College of Music.

Game Design: Adrian Becerra & Ashley Perez

Music & Sound Design: Markel Badallo Latorre, Sean Morrow, James Gillen & Remi Chandler

NOTE: Jumbo Juice was not optimized for browser play, and as such the mouse movement is incredibly messed up... but if you don't mind hitting escape to get the true position of your mouse cursor every two seconds, it's a fun play-through.
